import React from 'react'; function About() { return (

As a passionate and driven individual, I am excited to introduce myself as a recent graduate of UCLA EdX's rigorous full-stack web development bootcamp. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I am actively seeking opportunities to contribute my skills and knowledge to innovative projects as I embark on the next phase of my career journey.

My journey into the world of technology started during my time as a Computer Science major at Victor Valley College, where I am currently a dedicated third-year student. My academic pursuits have allowed me to develop a strong understanding of programming principles and a curiosity for solving complex problems. Coupled with my bootcamp experience, I have honed my abilities to build dynamic and responsive web applications that prioritize user experience and functionality.

I am motivated by the fast-paced nature of the tech industry and thrive on continuous learning and adaptation. My dedication to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies empowers me to deliver innovative solutions that make a positive impact. As I set out to secure opportunities in jobs and internships, I am excited to leverage my unique blend of academic achievement, bootcamp training, and my unwavering passion for coding to contribute meaningfully to a dynamic team.

second test for the about me

); } export default About;
